item.description:
Whiskey Republic

Hey Sailor Sunday - Time to Save Us Some Pitbulls!


5 dollar cover which will be donated to the providence animal leagues and rescues...

mass pitbull rescue

plus a couple other surpirses to donate money to local rescues

Dj magee will be spinning plus some other good stuff to be going on it's all for a good cause so come down get a beer and bring your puppies and of course your pitbulls!!!

HOT RODS!!!!

HOT STAFF!

****BANDS****

GREAT FOOD MENU!!

After the bands be sure to stick around because Dj will be spinning your favorite dance hits til 2 am!

This is a 21+ event. 

***We have some tricks up our sleeves for this week's party....you don't want to miss this announcement!***
item.name: HEY SAILOR SUNDAY - TIME TO SAVE US SOME PITBULLS!
